verses.verse: In the year <S%H8141><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> Uzziah's death, <S%H4194><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> on a throne, <S%H3678><s%> lofty <S%H7311><s%> and exalted, <S%H5375><s%> with the train <S%H7757><s%> of His robe <S%H7757><s%> filling <S%H4390><s%> the temple. <S%H1964><s%>

Seraphim <S%H9633><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> Him, each <S%H259><s%> having six <S%H8337><s%> wings; <S%H3671><s%> with two <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and with two <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and with two <S%H8147><s%> he flew. <S%H5774><s%>

And one <S%H2088><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> out to another <S%H2088><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Holy, <S%H6918><s%> Holy, <S%H6918><s%> Holy, <S%H6918><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> The whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4393><s%> of His glory. <S%H9202><s%>"

And the foundations <S%H9020><s%> of the thresholds <S%H5592><s%> trembled <S%H5128><s%> at the voice <S%H6963><s%> of him who called <S%H7121><s%> out, while the temple <S%H1004><s%> was filling <S%H4390><s%> with smoke. <S%H6227><s%>

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Woe <S%H188><s%> is me, for I am ruined! <S%H1820><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> I am a man <S%H376><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> And I live <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips; <S%H8193><s%> For my eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>"

Then one <S%H259><s%> of the seraphim <S%H9633><s%> flew <S%H5774><s%> to me, with a burning <S%H9574><s%> coal <S%H9574><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> which he had taken <S%H3947><s%> from the altar <S%H4196><s%> with tongs. <S%H4457><s%>

And he touched <S%H5060><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> [with it] and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> has touched <S%H5060><s%> your lips; <S%H8193><s%> and your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is taken <S%H5493><s%> away, <S%H5493><s%> and your sin <S%H9128><s%> is forgiven. <S%H3722><s%>"

Then I heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord, <S%H136><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Whom <S%H4310><s%> shall I send, <S%H7971><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> for Us?" Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> am I. Send <S%H7971><s%> me!"

And He said, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H1980><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> 'Keep <S%H8085><s%> on listening, <S%H8085><s%> but do not perceive; <S%H995><s%> Keep <S%H7200><s%> on looking, <S%H7200><s%> but do not understand. <S%H3045><s%>'

"Render <S%H8080><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> insensitive, <S%H8080><s%> Their ears <S%H241><s%> dull, <S%H3513><s%> And their eyes <S%H5869><s%> dim, <S%H9619><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> they see <S%H7200><s%> with their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> with their ears, <S%H241><s%> Understand <S%H995><s%> with their hearts, <S%H3824><s%> And return <S%H7725><s%> and be healed. <S%H7495><s%>"

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Lord, <S%H136><s%> how <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%>?" And He answered, <S%H559><s%> "Until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H518><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are devastated <S%H7582><s%> [and] without <S%H369><s%> inhabitant, <S%H3427><s%> Houses <S%H1004><s%> are without <S%H369><s%> people, <S%H120><s%> And the land <S%H127><s%> is utterly <S%H8077><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has removed <S%H7368><s%> men <S%H120><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> away, And the forsaken <S%H5805><s%> places <S%H5805><s%> are many <S%H7231><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

"Yet <S%H5750><s%> there will be a tenth <S%H6224><s%> portion <S%H6224><s%> in it, And it will again <S%H7725><s%> be [subject] to burning, <S%H1197><s%> Like a terebinth <S%H424><s%> or an oak <S%H437><s%> Whose <S%H834><s%> stump <S%H4676><s%> remains when <S%H834><s%> it is felled. <S%H7995><s%> The holy <S%H6944><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> is its stump. <S%H4676><s%>"
